title: Alton East
description: Alton East is a pet-friendly apartment community located in Atlanta, GA. It offers a variety of floor plans including studios, 1-bedroom, 2-bedroom, and 3-bedroom units. The apartments feature amenities such as an outdoor pool, a parking lot, and utilities included in the rent. The property is conveniently located in the Reynoldstown neighborhood, which is known for being dog-friendly and walkable to restaurants and grocery stores. The office hours are as follows: Mon 9:00am to 7:00pm, Tue 9:00am to 6:00pm, Wed 9:00am to 7:00pm, Thu 9:00am to 6:00pm, Fri 9:00am to 7:00pm, Sat 10:00am to 6:00pm, Sun 11:00am to 5:00pm.

importantInformation.viewings: Wed 9:00am to 7:00pm, Thu 9:00am to 6:00pm, Fri 9:00am to 7:00pm, Sat 10:00am to 6:00pm, Sun 11:00am to 5:00pm
